original_text: And they will salute thee, and give thee two loaves of bread; which thou shalt receive of their hands.
korean_text: 그들이 네게 문안하고 떡 두 덩이를 주겠고 너는 그의 손에서 받으리라

sentences.original_text: and give thee two loaves of bread
which thou shalt receive of their hands
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그들의 손에서 그것을 받을 것이다
